TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataServiceStreamProvider

summary.span: 使得二进制数据能够被访问并被更改为属于某实体（为媒体链接项）的媒体资源。

span.span: Enables binary data to be accessed and changed as a media resource that belongs to an entity that is a media link entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 开放式数据协议 (OData) 可让您通过使用基于以下构造的机制，独立于数据源中的项定义由数据服务公开的实体的二进制数据属性：The Open Data Protocol (OData) enables a binary data property of an entity exposed by a data service to be defined independently of an entry in a data feed by using a mechanism based on the following constructs: - 媒体资源 - 二进制大型对象数据（即为二进制数据），例如视频、音频、图像或其他媒体资源。Media resource - the binary large object data that is binary data, such as a video, audio, image or other media resources. - 媒体链接项 - 数据源中表示实体并具有对相关媒体资源的引用的 AtomPub 项。Media link entry - an AtomPub entry in a data feed that represents an entity and that has a reference to a related media resource. 有关详细信息，请参阅[流式处理提供程序](/dotnet/framework/data/wcf/streaming-provider-wcf-data-services)。For more information, see [Streaming Provider](/dotnet/framework/data/wcf/streaming-provider-wcf-data-services).

MemberSignature.Value: public void DeleteStream (object entity, System.Data.Services.DataServiceOperationContext operationContext);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DeleteStream(object entity, class System.Data.Services.DataServiceOperationContext operationContext) cil managed
Public Sub DeleteStream (entity As Object, operationContext As DataServiceOperationContext)
public: void DeleteStream(System::Object ^ entity, System::Data::Services::DataServiceOperationContext ^ operationContext);
abstract member DeleteStream : obj * System.Data.Services.DataServiceOperationContext -> unit

span.span: The media link entry that is deleted.
The instance that processes the request.

summary.span: 删除媒体链接项时会删除关联的媒体资源。

span.span: Deletes the associated media resource when a media link entry is deleted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当其关联媒体链接项从数据服务中删除时， 方法将提供用于删除媒体资源的实现。The method provides the implementation to delete a media resource when its associated media link entry is deleted from the data service. 有关详细信息，请参阅[流式处理提供程序](/dotnet/framework/data/wcf/streaming-provider-wcf-data-services)。For more information, see [Streaming Provider](/dotnet/framework/data/wcf/streaming-provider-wcf-data-services).

exception.span: 当 或 为 时。

span.span: When or are .

exception.span: 当 不是有二进制属性要进行流处理的实体时。

span.span: When is not an entity that has a binary property to stream.

exception.span: 当无法删除与 关联的流时。

span.span: When the stream associated with the cannot be deleted.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Stream GetReadStream (object entity, string etag, bool? checkETagForEquality, System.Data.Services.DataServiceOperationContext operationContext);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IO.Stream GetReadStream(object entity, string etag, valuetype System.Nullable`1<bool> checkETagForEquality, class System.Data.Services.DataServiceOperationContext operationContext) cil managed

public: System::IO::Stream ^ GetReadStream(System::Object ^ entity, System::String ^ etag, Nullable<bool> checkETagForEquality, System::Data::Services::DataServiceOperationContext ^ operationContext);
abstract member GetReadStream : obj * string * Nullable<bool> * System.Data.Services.DataServiceOperationContext -> System.IO.Stream

param.name: entity
param.span: 一个实体，它是具有相关媒体资源的媒体链接项。

span.span: The entity that is a media link entry with a related media resource.

param.name: etag
param.span: 作为发送到数据服务的 HTTP 请求的一部分发送的 eTag 值。

span.span: The eTag value sent as part of the HTTP request that is sent to the data service.

param.name: checkETagForEquality
param.span: 一个可以为 null 的 值，该值确定数据服务是否必须为所使用的 eTag 类型。

span.span: A nullable value that determines whether the data service must the type of eTag that is used.

param.name: operationContext
param.span: 数据服务用来处理请求的 实例。

span.span: The instance used by the data service to process the request.

summary.span: 返回包含指定实体（即媒体链接项）的媒体资源数据的流。

span.span: Returns a stream that contains the media resource data for the specified entity, which is a media link entry.

returns.span: 包含 的二进制属性数据的数据 。

span.span: The data that contains the binary property data of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eTag` 是 If-Match 或 If-None-Match 标头的值。`eTag` is the value of an If-Match or If-None-Match header. 支持以下值：The following values are supported: - `true`-如果 eTag 表示 If-match 标头，则为。`true` - when the eTag represents an If-Match header. - `false`-eTag 表示 "如果-无匹配" 标头。`false` - when the eTag represents an If-None-Match header. - `null`-如果请求中不存在 If-match 或 If-Match 标头，则为。`null` - when an If-Match or If-None-Match header is not present in the request. 当客户端请求指定 （这是媒体链接项）的媒体资源时，数据服务方法运行时将调用 `entity` 方法以获取数据服务返回到客户端的流。The method is called by the data service runtime to acquire the stream that the data service returns to the client when the client requests the media resource for the specified `entity`, which is a media link entry. 有关详细信息，请参阅[流式处理提供程序](/dotnet/framework/data/wcf/streaming-provider-wcf-data-services)。For more information, see [Streaming Provider](/dotnet/framework/data/wcf/streaming-provider-wcf-data-services).

MemberSignature.Value: public Uri GetReadStreamUri (object entity, System.Data.Services.DataServiceOperationContext operationContext);

abstract member GetReadStreamUri : obj * System.Data.Services.DataServiceOperationContext -> Uri

param.name: entity
param.span: 一个实体，它是具有相关媒体资源的媒体链接项。

span.span: The entity that is a media link entry with a related media resource.

param.name: operationContext
param.span: 数据服务用于处理请求的 实例。

span.span: The instance used by the data service to process the request.

summary.span: 返回用于请求属于指定实体的媒体资源的 URI。

span.span: Returns the URI that is used to request the media resource that belongs to the specified entity.

returns.span: 用于请求二进制数据流的 值。

span.span: A value that is used to request the binary data stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据服务运行时调用方法，以获取客户端在对媒体资源进行检索（即获取）请求时应使用的 URI。The method is called by the data service runtime to obtain the URI that clients should use when they make retrieve (that is, GET) requests for the media resource. 通过 方法实现返回的 值将用作媒体链接项中的编辑媒体链接，以引用媒体资源的位置。The value returned by the method implementation is used as the edit-media link in the media link entry to references the location of the media resource. 当此方法实现返回 null 时，数据服务将构造默认的 ，这通常是附加有 `/$value` 的实体的 URI。When the method implementation returns null, the data service will construct a default , which is usually the URI of the entity appended with `/$value`.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GetStreamContentType (object entity, System.Data.Services.DataServiceOperationContext operationContext);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetStreamContentType(object entity, class System.Data.Services.DataServiceOperationContext operationContext) cil managed
Public Function GetStreamContentType (entity As Object, operationContext As DataServiceOperationContext) As String
public: System::String ^ GetStreamContentType(System::Object ^ entity, System::Data::Services::DataServiceOperationContext ^ operationContext);
abstract member GetStreamContentType : obj * System.Data.Services.DataServiceOperationContext -> string

param.name: entity
param.span: 一个实体，它是具有相关媒体资源的媒体链接项。

span.span: The entity that is a media link entry with a related media resource.

param.name: operationContext
param.span: 数据服务用于处理请求的 实例。

span.span: The instance used by the data service to process the request.

summary.span: 返回属于指定实体的媒体资源的内容类型。

span.span: Returns the content type of the media resource that belongs to the specified entity.

returns.span: 二进制数据的有效 Content-Type。

span.span: A valid Content-Type of the binary data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据服务运行时调用 方法，以检索属于指定的 `entity` 的媒体资源的 Content-Type。The method is called by the data service runtime to retrieve the Content-Type of the media resource that belongs to the specified `entity`. 使用 方法实现设置媒体资源的 Content-Type。Use the method implementation to set the Content-Type of the media resource. 不要在 提供程序实现中直接设置 Content-Type 标头。Do not directly set the Content-Type header in your provider implementation.

param.name: entity
param.span: 作为具有相关媒体资源的媒体链接项的实体。

span.span: The entity that is a media link entry with a related media resource.

param.name: operationContext
param.span: 数据服务用于处理请求的 实例。

span.span: The instance used by the data service to process the request.

summary.span: 返回属于指定媒体链接项的媒体资源的 eTag。

span.span: Returns the eTag of the media resource that belongs to the specified media link entry.

returns.span: 与 关联的媒体资源的 eTag。

span.span: eTag of the media resource associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据服务运行时调用 方法，以检索与 `entity` 相关联的媒体资源的 eTag。The method is called by the data service runtime to retrieve the eTag of the media resource that is associated with the `entity`. 您必须实现 方法，以使数据服务能够管理媒体资源的并发性。You must implement the method to enable the data service to manage concurrency for the media resource.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Stream GetWriteStream (object entity, string etag, bool? checkETagForEquality, System.Data.Services.DataServiceOperationContext operationContext);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IO.Stream GetWriteStream(object entity, string etag, valuetype System.Nullable`1<bool> checkETagForEquality, class System.Data.Services.DataServiceOperationContext operationContext) cil managed
Public Function GetWriteStream (entity As Object, etag As String, checkETagForEquality As Nullable(Of Boolean), operationContext As DataServiceOperationContext) As Stream

public: System::IO::Stream ^ GetWriteStream(System::Object ^ entity, System::String ^ etag, Nullable<bool> checkETagForEquality, System::Data::Services::DataServiceOperationContext ^ operationContext);
abstract member GetWriteStream : obj * string * Nullable<bool> * System.Data.Services.DataServiceOperationContext -> System.IO.Stream

param.name: entity
param.span: 一个实体，它是具有相关媒体资源的媒体链接项。

span.span: The entity that is a media link entry with a related media resource.

param.name: etag
param.span: 作为发送到数据服务的 HTTP 请求的一部分发送的 eTag 值。

span.span: The eTag value that is sent as part of the HTTP request that is sent to the data service.

param.name: checkETagForEquality
param.span: 一个可以为 null 的 值，该值指示客户端请求的并发检查的类型。

span.span: A nullable value that indicates the type of concurrency check requested by the client.

param.name: operationContext
param.span: 数据服务用来处理请求的 实例。

span.span: The instance that is used by the data service to process the request.

summary.span: 返回流，该流由数据服务用于写入从客户端接收的属于指定实体的媒体资源的二进制数据。

span.span: Returns the stream that the data service uses to write the binary data for the media resource received from the client that belongs to the specified entity.

returns.span: 一个有效的 ，数据服务使用它来写入从客户端接收的二进制数据的内容。

span.span: A valid the data service uses to write the contents of a binary data received from the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当与 关联的媒体资源正在处理插入或更新操作时，数据服务运行时将调用 `entity` 方法。The method is called by the data service runtime when an insert or update operation is being processed for the media resource that is associated with the `entity`. 方法绝不会返回 `null` 值。The method should never return a `null` value. `operationContext` 将作为自变量提供，因为此接口方法的实现器将需要来自 HTTP 请求标头的信息以便创建写入流。The `operationContext` is supplied as an argument because an implementer of this interface method will need information from the HTTP request headers to create a write stream. 当您实现此方法时，您必须根据需要执行并发性检查。When you implement this method, you must perform concurrency checks as needed. 如果请求中包含 If-match 或 If-match 请求标头，则 `etag` 将不会为 `null` 。If an If-Match or If-None-Match request header was included in the request, the `etag` will not be `null`. 在此情况下，这种方法必须执行适当的并发性检查。In this case, this method must perform the appropriate concurrency check. 如果通过并发性检查，则此方法应返回所请求的流。If the concurrency check passes, this method should return the requested stream. 如果并发性检查失败，则该方法应引发 并显示适当的 HTTP 响应代码。If the concurrency checks fail, the method should raise a with the appropriate HTTP response code. `eTag` 是 If-Match 或 If-None-Match 标头的值。`eTag` is the value of an If-Match or If-None-Match header. 支持以下值 `checkETagForEquality` ：The following values of `checkETagForEquality` are supported: - `true`-如果 eTag 表示 If-match 标头，则为。`true` - when the eTag represents an If-Match header. - `false`-eTag 表示 "如果-无匹配" 标头。`false` - when the eTag represents an If-None-Match header. - `null`-如果请求中不存在 If-match 或 If-Match 标头，则为。`null` - when an If-Match or If-None-Match header is not present in the request. 当您实现此方法时，您不得设置 Content-Type 或 eTag HTTP 响应标头，因为它们由数据服务运行时设置。When you implement this method, you must not set the Content-Type or eTag HTTP response headers because they are set by the data service runtime. 您可以通过使用所提供的 `operationContext` 设置剩余 HTTP 响应标头。You may set the remaining HTTP response headers by using the supplied `operationContext`. 当实现此方法时，您应该只设置成功响应所需的 `operationContext` 属性。When you implement this method, you should only set the properties on `operationContext` that are required for a successful response. 更改其他 `operationContext` 属性可能会损坏来自数据服务的响应。Changing other properties on `operationContext` may corrupt the response from the data service. 当所有字节都成功都写入流时，数据服务运行时将关闭流。The data service runtime closes the stream when all bytes have been successfully written to the stream. 如果在写入到流时出现错误，数据服务将对客户端生成错误响应。If an error occurs while writing to the stream, the data service generates an error response to the client. 当您实现 方法时，您应引发以下例外，如下所示：When you implement the method, you should raise the following exceptions as indicated: |异常类型Exception type|条件Condition| |--------------------|---------------| ||当 `entity` 或 `operationContext` 为 `null` 时。When `entity` or `operationContext` are `null`.| ||当 `entity` 不含二进制属性时。When `entity` does not have a binary property.| ||当不能返回有效的流时。When a valid stream cannot be returned.|

MemberSignature.Value: public string ResolveType (string entitySetName, System.Data.Services.DataServiceOperationContext operationContext);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string ResolveType(string entitySetName, class System.Data.Services.DataServiceOperationContext operationContext) cil managed
Public Function ResolveType (entitySetName As String, operationContext As DataServiceOperationContext) As String
public: System::String ^ ResolveType(System::String ^ entitySetName, System::Data::Services::DataServiceOperationContext ^ operationContext);
abstract member ResolveType : string * System.Data.Services.DataServiceOperationContext -> string

param.name: entitySetName
param.span: 完全限定的实体集名称。

span.span: Fully-qualified entity set name.

param.name: operationContext
param.span: 数据服务用于处理请求的 实例。

span.span: The instance that is used by the data service to process the request.

summary.span: 返回一个命名空间限定的类型名称，该名称表示数据服务运行时必须为媒体链接项创建的类型，该媒体链接项与正在插入的媒体资源的数据流相关联。

span.span: Returns a namespace-qualified type name that represents the type that the data service runtime must create for the media link entry that is associated with the data stream for the media resource that is being inserted.

returns.span: 一个命名空间限定的类型名称。

span.span: A namespace-qualified type name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当新的媒体链接项实体正在与其媒体资源一起处于创建过程中时，数据服务将调用 方法。The method is called by the data service when a new entity that is a media link entry is being created together with its media resource. 此方法的实现器必须检查 `operationContext` 中的请求标头，并返回一个命名空间限定的类型名称，该名称表示数据服务运行时必须实例化的类型，以便创建与新的媒体资源相关联的媒体链接项。An implementer of this method must inspect the request headers in `operationContext` and return the namespace qualified type name that represents the type that the data service runtime must instantiate to create the media link entry that is associated with the new media resource. 表示此类型名称的字符串将传递给 方法，以创建媒体链接项。The string that represents this type name is passed to the method to create the media link entry. 当您实现 方法时，您应引发以下例外，如下所示：When you implement the method, you should raise the following exceptions as indicated: |异常类型Exception type|条件Condition| |--------------------|---------------| ||当 `operationContext` 为 `null` 时。When `operationContext` is `null`.| ||当无法基于 `operationContext` 解析实体类型名称时。When an entity type name cannot be resolved based on the `operationContext`.|

MemberSignature.Value: public int StreamBufferSize { get; }
.property instance int32 StreamBufferSize
Public ReadOnly Property StreamBufferSize As Integer
public: property int StreamBufferSize { int get(); };
member this.StreamBufferSize : int

span.span: Gets the size of the stream buffer.

value.span: 表示缓冲区的大小的整数。

span.span: Integer that represents the size of buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认缓存区大小为 64K 字节。The default buffer size is 64K bytes.
